metadata.title: CVE-2019-8382 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1-628. A NULL pointer dereferenceoccurs in the function AP4_List:Find located in Core/Ap4List.h when calledfrom Core/Ap4Movie.cpp. It can be triggered by sending a crafted file tothe mp4dump binary. It allows an attacker to cause a Denial of Service(Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
